casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Robert I. TANNER, Defendant-Petitioner. C-862 September Term 2017
080529 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 21, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000335-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
